channel.title: Silverbirch
channel.copyright: 2009-2012 Creative Commons Attribution Non-Commercial Share Alike License
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Tear in the Fabric of the Night Sky
channel.itunes:author: Rob Kaay
channel.itunes:summary: A diverse group of children that live through a horrendous event, meet up again as adults to tackle the mysteries of their past, and encounter something so exceptionable, so unexplainable that they are quite literally changed forever.
channel.description:
My name is Nudge. When I was only nine years of age my friends and I found a mysterious black box with a red lightning bolt symbol on its lid. Inside were a bunch of pages and some weird looking mushrooms also featuring the red lightning bolt image. The pages revealed that by consuming a mushroom, a gateway to Silverbirch could be opened. We also read that Silvers, the occupants of Silverbirch, could control weak Humans who weren't in control of themselves.
Without warning, a bolt of lightning shot through the abandoned house we were playing in and claimed Zoe. Extremely scared, Dieter took off with the bag of mushrooms, Chase took off with the box and pages and Hayley and I were left to explain what had happened to the police.
For twenty years we lived separate lives, except Hayley and I, who had been lovers for a period of time but recently separated because of my edgy occupation.
It was Hayley's bright idea to reunite us all at her birthday party in Hollywood. We traded various stories about losing control of ourselves and managed to offend each other in the process. Hayley judged me, Chase confessed he hadn't destroyed the box or the pages and Dieter boasted he still had the mushrooms.
